songs.title: Don’t Sleep On Me Hoe
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: Pouya]
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow

[Verse 1: Pouya]
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
BatKave in this bitch and you haters is slow
In the back of the 'Lac in my zone bumping Bone
Fuck it, let's do it
The pussy, I chew it
The motto is C.R.E.A.M., I live for my team
Talk that shit, my style is mean
Know what I mean, bitch, I'm all in the scene
With the fiends that don't give a fuck
About your feelings, your dealing with villains
That live for the killings, I'm raising the ceiling
I'm feeling I'm winning in rap
Turn around, give that booty a slap
Fuck that ho, man, she's so whack
Put it to the side, know I'm back on track
That ho is nothing but a trick
Rabbit in a hat, fucking then passing it back to my homies
Raised on that bread and bologna
Phony bitches ain't shit to me though, where the mask at?
I'm lost in the pussy, where the map at?
I'm bringing the phonk for young world
Poppin' that bitch and I'm shopping at the mall
Then, your ho I'm 'bout to call

[Chorus: Pouya & Yung Raw]
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow (Uh)

[Verse 2: Yung Raw]
Don't sleep on me, ho
Wake your ass up with the super mean flow
Banking, no changing, like the casino
Smoking and choking like [?] on the dino
For your ho, might want a bit
Suck on my dick way before percocets
Killin' that pussy then resurrect
She tweeted, "Yung Raw was so perfect with sex"
Up on her legs, then I bury my head
Make this shit quick because I got to split
In the ghetto stuffing 'rillos
Sleep on me, get [?] with pillow
Armadillo qualities
Roll the weed, so Gnarly P
Heard you took a nap on me, I'm waiting for apologies

[Pre-Chorus: Yung Raw]
If you did it for a second time, you must be so deaf or blind
You can't see that I'm a beast? I feast on you in record time
You did it for a second time, you must be so deaf or blind
You can't see that I'm a beast? I feast on you in record time

[Chorus: Pouya]
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Don't sleep on me, ho
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow
Packin' the clip and I'm fuckin' the flow

[Verse 3: Mike The Magician]
Mikey The Magician 'bout to show you how to do it
My demeanor is on excellence, Italian stayin' fluent
Gucci interior, Louis I bought for her
I'm 'bout to beat it up, I'm fuckin' boxin' her
Beat it up like Mayweather
You think you ball but I play better
Hot like the sun in this May weather
The way that I fuck is just way better
Murder team is just killing the pussy
It's under construction, I'm drilling the pussy
All of your bitches, they looking like Snooki
I'm betting a milli' so go call a [?]
Mikey The Magician, abracadabra
Told that bitch to flash like I was holding up my camera
Swisher's with the kush, next to lemonade and Fanta
Slide through the pussy, Florida Panthers
